item.description:
It is time to start discussing the annual pilgrimage to OSH. Please join me at the Bullock Hangar for some pizza, past OSH pictures, videos, stories and this year's trip planning. Information on transportation, housing, air venture tips will be available. This will also be a great opportunity to find a co-pilot if you are looking to fly yourself out there. If you can't make the planning meeting, but would like to make the trip with the group, please let me know. Oh boy, I am getting the chills just writing this!!!!

Only 186 days to go after the meeting!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: OSH Planning Meeting
